MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the TD9 Postcode area of Hawick . We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to complete a repair due to a fault on our underground cable network. we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.19AM on 4th February 2021.
